name: Roll the ball (TheNewbee01)
description:
Survive the adventure with our ball! In this exciting and challenging game, you must navigate the ball through dangerous terrain and avoid falling from the cliff. As you progress, the game will get harder with new obstacles appearing. But don't worry, power-ups will also appear to give you an advantage. Put your skills to the test and see how far you can go in this fast-paced and addictive game. Start your survival journey here! 

For Moving(WASD)

For Powerups

Click F to fire missile

Click Space to jump
